verses.verse: It happened in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H5212>Nisan,<s%> in the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> when <S%H3196>wine<s%> was <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5375>him,<s%> that I took up the <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to the <S%H4428>king.<s%> Now I had not been <S%H7451>sad<s%> before in his <S%H6440>presence.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6440>me,<s%> "Why is your face <S%H7451>sad,<s%> since you are not <S%H2470>sick?<s%> This is nothing else but <S%H7455>sorrow<s%> of <S%H3820>heart.<s%>" Then I was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H3372>afraid.<s%>

I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "Let the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H5769>forever!<s%> Why <S%H6440>shouldn't<s%> my face be <S%H3415>sad,<s%> when the <S%H5892>city,<s%> the <S%H1004>place<s%> of my <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H6913>tombs,<s%> lies <S%H2720>waste,<s%> and its <S%H8179>gates<s%> have been <S%H398>consumed<s%> with <S%H784>fire?<s%>"
Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1245>me,<s%> "For what do you make request?" So I <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "If it <S%H2895>pleases<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and if your <S%H5650>servant<s%> has found <S%H3190>favor<s%> in your <S%H6440>sight,<s%> that you would <S%H7971>send<s%> me to <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> of my <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H6913>tombs,<s%> that I may build <S%H1129>it.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7694>me<s%> (the queen was also <S%H3427>sitting<s%> by <S%H681>him<s%>), "For how long shall your <S%H4109>journey<s%> <S%H7725>be?<s%> And when will you return?" So it <S%H3190>pleased<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H5414>me;<s%> and I set him a <S%H2165>time.<s%>

Moreover I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "If it <S%H2895>pleases<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> let <S%H107>letters<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> me to the <S%H6346>governors<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>River,<s%> that they may let me pass <S%H5674>through<s%> until I <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3063>Judah;<s%>

and a <S%H107>letter<s%> to <S%H623>Asaph<s%> the <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H6508>forest,<s%> that he may <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H6086>timber<s%> to make <S%H7136>beams<s%> for the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1002>citadel<s%> by the <S%H1004>temple,<s%> for the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and for the <S%H1004>house<s%> that I shall enter <S%H935>into.<s%>" The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>granted<s%> my <S%H2896>requests,<s%> because of the good <S%H3027>hand<s%> of my God on <S%H430>me.<s%>

Then I <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H6346>governors<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>River,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H107>letters.<s%> Now the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> with me <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>army<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

When <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> the <S%H2772>Horonite,<s%> and <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%> the <S%H5650>servant,<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H3415>it,<s%> it grieved them <S%H7451>exceedingly,<s%> because a <S%H120>man<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H2896>welfare<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
So I <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and was there <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

I <S%H6965>arose<s%> in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> I and <S%H4592>some<s%> <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> with <S%H5046>me;<s%> neither told I any <S%H582>man<s%> what my <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> into my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> for <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> neither was there any <S%H929>animal<s%> with <S%H929>me,<s%> except the animal that I rode <S%H7392>on.<s%>

I went <S%H3318>out<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%> by the <S%H1516>valley<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> even <S%H6440>toward<s%> the <S%H8577>jackal<s%>'s <S%H5869>well,<s%> and to the <S%H830>dung<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and <S%H7663>viewed<s%> the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> which were broken <S%H6555>down,<s%> and its <S%H8179>gates<s%> were <S%H398>consumed<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

Then I went <S%H5674>on<s%> to the <S%H5869>spring<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> and to the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1295>pool:<s%> but there was no <S%H4725>place<s%> for the <S%H929>animal<s%> that was under me to <S%H5674>pass.<s%>

Then went I <S%H5927>up<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%> by the <S%H5158>brook,<s%> and <S%H7663>viewed<s%> the <S%H2346>wall;<s%> and I turned <S%H7725>back,<s%> and <S%H935>entered<s%> by the <S%H1516>valley<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and so <S%H7725>returned.<s%>

The <S%H5461>rulers<s%> <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know where I <S%H1980>went,<s%> or what I <S%H6213>did;<s%> neither had I as <S%H3651>yet<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> it to the <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> nor to the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> nor to the <S%H2715>nobles,<s%> nor to the <S%H5461>rulers,<s%> nor to the <S%H3499>rest<s%> who <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work.<s%>

Then I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7200>them,<s%> "You see the <S%H7451>evil<s%> case that we are <S%H3389>in,<s%> how Jerusalem lies <S%H2720>waste,<s%> and its <S%H8179>gates<s%> are <S%H3341>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%> <S%H3212>Come,<s%> let us build <S%H1129>up<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> that we <S%H2781>won't<s%> be disgraced."

I <S%H5046>told<s%> them of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of my <S%H430>God<s%> which was <S%H2896>good<s%> on <S%H4428>me,<s%> as also of the king's <S%H1697>words<s%> that he had <S%H559>spoken<s%> to <S%H559>me.<s%> They said, <S%H6965>"Let<s%>'s rise up and <S%H1129>build.<s%>" So they <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> for the good <S%H2896>work.<s%>

But when <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> the <S%H2772>Horonite,<s%> and <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%> the <S%H5650>servant,<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite,<s%> and <S%H1654>Geshem<s%> the <S%H6163>Arabian,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3932>it,<s%> they ridiculed <S%H959>us,<s%> and despised <S%H559>us,<s%> and said, "What is this <S%H1697>thing<s%> that you are <S%H6213>doing?<s%> Will you <S%H4775>rebel<s%> against the <S%H4428>king?<s%>"

Then <S%H7725>answered<s%> I <S%H559>them,<s%> and said to <S%H430>them,<s%> "The God of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> will <S%H6743>prosper<s%> <S%H5650>us.<s%> Therefore we, his servants, will <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H1129>build;<s%> but you have no <S%H2506>portion,<s%> nor <S%H6666>right,<s%> nor <S%H2146>memorial,<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>"
